snippet: The 86-year-old New York-based artist fills the Galerie Thaddaeus Ropac Paris Pantin with his signature colorful portraits from the past 45 years.
abstract: The 86-year-old New York-based artist fills the Galerie Thaddaeus Ropac Paris Pantin with his signature colorful portraits from the past 45 years.

headline.main: The Many Faces of Alex Katz
